nodes.bodyText: Should this be equals instead of not equals?
Hmmm good catch. Since this is not yet used this piece of code was not verified.
Same as above - should these be equals instead of not equals?
Can we get the color from theme.palette here too? And same for the other colors in these styles.

Are there any limits on the values of zoom?
No. We can zoom in to any level.
